author: Alice Ross
description: Brady had been receiving palliative care at Ashworth psychiatric hospital on Merseyside
title: Ian Brady, the Moors murderer, dies aged 79

author: Stephen White
description: The Moors Murderer wanted a guard of honour and a gangland-style funeral, but he will be cremated in front of a handful of officials and his remains disposed of near Ashworth security hospital
title: Sick Ian Brady demanded his ashes be scattered on the Moors with his victims

description: It was March 1, 2003, when Professor Jeremy Coid travelled up from London to Ashworth high security hospital for an audience with Ian Brady.
title: Ian Brady was a true psychopath who hinted to me that he may have killed more

author: John Scheerhout
description: The 79-year-old murderer died at the high-security Ashworth Hospital on Monday night after falling ill with cancer and emphysema over the last few days
title: Moors Murderer Ian Brady revealed his funeral wishes to a pen friend

author: By James Tozer, Ian Drury for the Daily Mail, Abe Hawken and Thomas Burrows
description: Moors murderer Ian Brady (pictured), who killed five children alongside his co-accused Myra Hindley in the 1960s, has died after suffering from inoperable lung cancer, Ashworth Hospital has confirmed.
title: Moors murderer Ian Brady is dead aged 79

author: By Richard Spillett, Crime Correspondent For Mailonline
description: The serial killer (pictured by a court sketch artist in 2013) spent 29 years in mainstream jails before being moved to Park Lane special hospital, in Merseyside, which was later renamed Ashworth.
title: Ian Brady cost taxpayers £8MILLION in prison and psychiatric bills

author: Shehab Khan
description: Ian Brady, the Moors murderer, has died aged 79, an NHS spokesman has confirmed.  The serial killer was being held at Ashworth Hospital, at a high security psychiatric unit, and receiving palliative care.  He had reportedly been ill for some time and had been on successive hunger strikes since 1999 arguing that he should be allowed to die.
title: Ian Brady, the Moors murderer, dies aged 79
